subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L.’s rookie scoring leader, Patrick Kane, had a power-play goal and an assist to help the Blackhawks beat Detroit, 3-2, last night in Chicago, ending the Red Wings’ record-tying winning streak at nine games. Also last night, Paul Stastny had two goals and an assist to help the host Colorado Avalanche beat the Minnesota Wild, 4-2.
